title: The Most fkn Annoying kind of lag?
body: So ever since this latest patch I've been having the weirdest lag and i need a fix asap, cost me about 5 games so far, i have perfect ping, high fps but for some reason i lag? like everything just stops the minions just endlessly attack each other, although  i can move around perfectly fine, i have no auto attack animations, or ability animation, all i see is my health going down when something is attacking me i really don't know what to do please halp :((

replies.body: OMG, SOMEBODY HAS THE SAME PROBLEM AS ME! This is great to see as so now I know its not just me

Hey man,

It's possible you're experiencing high packet loss and/or packet buffering, I recommend you both take a look at the [Troubleshooting Connection Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) page, specifically attempt the fixes outlined under the [Packet Buffering](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq7) and [Packet Loss](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq6) headings.

Hope this helps.
